User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TempInbox application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

planId.description: The ID of the user's current subscription plan.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has administrative privileges.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

Inbox.title: Inbox
Inbox.description: Represents a single temporary email inbox.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this inbox.

emailAddress.description: The temporary email address of the inbox.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the inbox and its contents will be deleted.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the inbox was created.

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Represents a single email message within an inbox.

inboxId.description: The ID of the parent inbox.

userId.description: Denormalized UID of the user for security rules.

receivedAt.description: Timestamp of when the email was received.

textContent.description: Plain text content of the email.

rawContent.description: The full, raw MIME content of the email.

read.description: Indicates if the email has been read by the user.

Plan.title: Plan
Plan.description: Defines a subscription plan and its features.

definition.description: Sub-collection of emails for a given inbox.
